topic.title: How to Remove the Numbering From the PDF Bookmarks

body.p: By default the PDF bookmarks labels are generated taking into account the text set before the chapters titles. Since usually this contains the part, chapter or section numbers, then the PDF Bookmarks will make use of them.
The solution is to remove the content(before) from the bookmark-label, leaving just the content(text).
